If you are buying left 4 dead for the first time, this game properly introduces you to it. It is an absolute blast to play, whether you are alone or with your friends. If you played left 4 dead 2 first, you will find that this game is set apart from that game by it's better looking textures, along with it's more darker and serious atmosphere. This game had a vibe that left 4 dead 2 lacked. Why is it so different? Turtle Rock studio (Evolve and the recent Back 4 Blood developers) created this game, but then had it bought off of them by valve. Valve then went on to develop left 4 dead 2. So I definitely recommend it. ;)

Chame seus Amigos pra passar por esse Apocalipse Zumbi junto a ti!
O Clássico Coop de Matar Zumbis que ganhou o Prêmio "Game of the Year".
É um Survival de Matar Zumbis, onde Você passa por diversos locais, seguindo o Rumo da História.
Dá pra jogar o Modo História com mais 3 Amigos (COOP), o que Eu acho que é o Ponto Forte do Jogo.
Fora os vários outros Modos Multiplayer que o Jogo oferece.
Os Gráficos são Excelentes pro ano que foi lançado (2008).
Os Efeitos Sonoros são Perfeitos.
A Jogabilidade é Ótima.
Tudo nesse Jogo é realmente muito bom!
Super Recomendo!

Way back when, I got this game in the bundle with Left 4 Dead 2, the day before the winter sale. As a preface, I may be reiterating (or at least mentioning similar points as the games are, well similar) from my review of Left 4 Dead 2, so feel free to check that out.

Left 4 Dead is a great game. The style of campaign, wherein teamwork is encouraged, is challenging at times, but in the end it is rewarding. The gameplay has a good balance of everything, as no element, such as the plot or map details, are too overpowering. Furthermore, Left 4 Dead is able to provide a casual and fun time with friends, or an intense and difficult experience alone, and everything in between. The game may be daunting at first, though with a little practice and in doing online campaigns with more experienced players, you'll get the hang of it in no time.

I recommend Left 4 Dead, though I say go play Left 4 Dead 2 first, as there's more to do there. You're best bet is to get the bundle in my opinion, so you have both.
Amazing game. but instead of this play Left 4 Dead 2. it has everything from first one

La verdad tenía muchos mejores recuerdos del juego, pero parece que era debido a la inmadurez que tenía. Ahora, después de algunos años vuelvo a descargarlo y la verdad me parece un juego tan vacío en el que todo se basa en matar zombis y ya. Si tenés amigos seguro que vale la pena, pero en el caso de que quieras disfrutarlo por tu cuenta mejor pasar de él porque es una pérdida de tiempo.

The problem is: these bots are the dumbest I had ever got to see in my entire life!
They're too dumb they get in your line of fire. This really ruined alot of my runs where I aim to get the "Safety First" Achievement.
And they can even totally ignore you being pinned or incabbed. This too ruined my runs on getting the "Stand Tall" Achievement. That's how dumb they are, I really hate the bots but I like the characters.
The game is great but the bots are the dumbest, if there's a fix or anything please lemme know... if you read that in the first place.
